name: Fish for gold
description: In this game you will be in the place of a hunter of fish in the ocean. You need to catch all the fish, for each of which you will be given money. But be careful! In addition to harmless fish, there are dangerous sharks and octopuses.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 duo + Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
